<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser"> <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <activation_example>!maintainers</activation_example> <active>true</active> <description>Highlighting Hacktoberfest Maintainers</description> <emoji>:technologist:</emoji> <flags>gmi</flags> <include_in_help>true</include_in_help> <order/> <regex>!hackmaintainers|!hacktobermaintainers|!maintainershacktoberfest</regex> <script><![CDATA[/* activation_example:!maintainers regex:!hackmaintainers|!hacktobermaintainers|!maintainershacktoberfest flags:gmi */
(function(){
var strMessage = 'Navigate to `https://github.com/ServiceNowDevProgram/Hacktoberfest?tab=readme-ov-file#reviewers` to checkout the Hacktoberfest crew who are maintaining your projects ' var send_chat = new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, strMessage, false);
})();]]></script> <stop_processing>false</stop_processing> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-19 15:38:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a5d1aeda83519210ae0854b6feaad3f3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-19 15:38:45</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_slackerbot_parser> </record_update>
